nodes.text: A B1 battle droid was stationed on the Separatist Subjugator-class heavy cruiser, the Malevolence, and served under command of General Grievous.

In 22 BBY, after the Malevolence suffered a defeat at the Battle of the Kaliida Nebula, the Separatist forces captured Naboo senator Padmé Amidala and brought her aboard the ship in order to force the Galactic Republic ships to stop their attack. The senator eventually managed to escape and this droid was part of a squad tasked with finding her. Later, this droid and two other came across Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, who came to the warship to save Amidala. Despite what this droid said, the other two droids opened fire on the Jedi, who deflected the shots back with their lightsabers, hitting both of them. This droid was later destroyed when the Malevolence crashed on the Dead Moon of Antar.
